name: Cirno's Ice Cream Tycoon
description:
Collect 1,999 coins to win!

Don't drop the happiness meter below 50%!

You have to keep freezing the ice cream by blowing, but freezing customers will make them unhappy!

  • E to interact
  • R to eat
  • F to freeze
  • G to give

◆ Known Issues

  • Cirno doesn't have wings. (I've noticed it today)
  • Too many Daiyouseis.

◆ Credits

  • Thug Life Cool Glasses - Rojal on pngall.com (CC 4.0 BY-NC)
  • フラット気分 by shimtone (title bgm)
  • 冒険サマー by shimtone (in-game bgm)
  • Bad Luck by こおろぎ (game over bgm)
  • 36exposure roll of film written by 清水裕介 (game clear bgm)

◆ Updates

  • v1.0.1:
    • Game over conditions have been eased to 50% (from 60%).
    • It takes more time for new customers to arrive when you have many customers.

Thank you for playing!
